titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Taiwan should be accorded full and equal membership in the World Health Organization (WHO) and other international organizations.
Expressing the sense of Congress that Taiwan should be accorded full and equal membership in the World Health Organization (WHO) and other international organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) Taiwan deserves full membership in the World Health Organization (WHO) and other international organizations; and (2) the United States should take a leading role in condemning Taiwan's exclusion from the World Health Assembly in 2005, and in gaining international support for Taiwan's membership in WHO and other international organizations.
